sentences.sentence: Ocelot: Perhaps? This man was our comrade!
sentences.translation: 也许？这人可是我们的同志！

sentences.sentence: Ocelot: An ocelot never lets his prey escape.
sentences.translation: 山猫从来不会让猎物溜掉的。

sentences.sentence: Ocelot: You're going to nuke your fellow Russians! ?
sentences.translation: 难道你要用核弹攻击你的同胞？
